column4: I can't install Ubuntu 8.04 LTS. It comes up with 'ATA3 SOFT RESET FAILED (DEVICE NOT FOUND)' Can anyone help with my problem please? Perhaps it's because my optical drive is SATA? I don't know... (btw, if anyone can see this can they let me know, i'm not sure if my messages are working, thanks)
this is the live cd or the alt cd
I got the CD in the post this morning, it says Ubuntu 8.04 Desktop Edition.
you can get into the boot menu and remove quiet and splash and see what the exact hang up is
